verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: accused] [ARG1: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi] [ARG2: of being an “ MS-13 lover ”] and dismissed a Democratic Senate candidate as a “ tool ” of Minority Leader Chuck Schumer .
